text: Kavita Paudwal Tulpule (born 1974), is an Indian singer. She is known for singing devotional songs Bhajan and has released around 40 music albums, including Gayatri Mantra, Krishna and Lakshmi and Amrutvani. == References == == Other websites == * * Kavita Paudwal plans a comeback Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Indian singers
title: Kavita Paudwal
